    • About Tom Nickley


    After only a few short years, The Nickley Group is one of the top selling real estate teams in Florida, will sell over 300 homes this year. With offices in Central and South Florida, The Nickley Group is on pace for $85 million in sales volume and is currently the fastest growing real estate team in Florida. The Nickley Group team consists of experienced buyers specialists, seasoned listing specialists, an inside sales agent, a full time marketing guru, a full time operations expert, a listing coordinator and a client care coordinator.
